channel.title: Pages on Starting up | Central America

item.description:
Edwin Urquilla

About me

Salvadoran engineer, project leader, architect and developer.
Avid autodidact striving to push forward a pragmatic change in the industry. Looking to never stop traveling and always making a difference. Currently enjoying work and challenges at Midō sv and SIGMuni

Experience

Sistema de Información de la Gestión Municipal

Sysadmin, Developer And Tech Consultant

Software Architect and Linux sysadmin of on premises servers
Front end developer with React.js/Node.js stack
API developer with Java EE and Play Framework!

Midō Internacional

Technical Lead And CTO

Interview and introduce new members of the technical team. Architect and develop solutions for government and financial entities, as well for diverse enterprises with technological needs. Managed and develop projects using Devops techniques with tools like Docker, Vagrant and Git. Mentored team members in technologies like JavaEE, Ruby on Rails, Cordova, Angular.js and Scala. Deploy applications to production infrastructure.

Freelance Developer

Freelance as a ( Web | Mobile ) Developer

Developed projects from games to IVR systems with focus on e-commerce sites. Used technologies like Asterisk, CoronaSDK, Ruby on Rails and Android SDK.

Manuel Solís Law Firm

Web Developer

Developed modules for a web application to control enterprise resources like clients, cases and information from operators, assistants and supervisors.

Other abilities

  • Professional beer lover
  • Avid non-standard traveler
  • Very amateur salsa dancer
